title: St. Ives;
author: Stevenson, Robert Louis
snippet: ^'^The dinner is official," he explained. ^^The office- bearers and Senatus of the University of Cramond — an educational institution in which I have the honour to be Professor of Nonsense — meet to do honour to our friend Icarus, at the old-established Jiowffy Cramond Bridge. One place is vacant, fascinating stranger, — I offer it to you ! "
